```{r}

date <- data$arrival_date_year

maxima <- max(date)
maxima

minimo <- min(date)
minimo

summary(data)


data_no_canceled <- data[data$is_canceled == 0,]
data_no_canceled_2016 <- data[data$arrival_date_year == 2016,]

data_no_canceled_2016 <- data_no_canceled %>%
  filter(arrival_date_year == 2016) %>%
  group_by(arrival_date_month) %>% 
  summarise(Recuento = n())
  
data_no_canceled_2016 %>% 
  plot(aes(x = arrival_date_month, y = Recuento))


```
